decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number(s): STA-P101 Rev 2 Site and Location Plan; STA-P102 Rev 2 Existing Ground and First Floor Plan; STA-P103 Rev 2 Existing Roof and Sections; STA-P104 Rev 1 Existing Elevations; STA-P105 Rev 4 Proposed Ground and First Floor Plan; STA-P106 Rev 4 Proposed Roof Plan and Sections; STA-P107 Rev 4 Proposed Elevations.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4, 7A and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013). | The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013). | No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policy D6 of the London Plan (2021). | The window/s inserted in the side elevations shall be obscure glazed and non-opening (where openable parts less than 1.7m above floor) unless otherwise confirmed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
Reason: To safeguard neighbouring amenity from light pollution in accordance with policy 7A of Ealing's Development Management DPD (2013) and policy D6 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Single-storey front extension; single storey side and rear wrap around extension; part first floor rear extension; installation of one side window to first floor
